title: _tomcc : 正在修复Build 6 的一个问题
author: 呆瓜Domado
txt_content:
本帖最后由 2641324669 于 2015-8-7 14:36 编辑 

Tommaso Checchi @_tomcc


Oh well, while I was all fixing stuff @darngeek and @shoghicp released build 6... the input lag fix will be for build 7 then!

哦好的,当我在修复BUG时@darngeek 和 @shoghicp就发布了测试版6.
然后我们会在Build 7 修复输入卡顿的问题!


Ok @darngeek wants you to know he actually discovered the solution to the input lag. It's true, go ask him how!


好, @darngeek 发现了如何解决输入延迟的问题，对！是真的，你们快去问他!
